description: This course is designed to deepen understanding of the foundations, organisation and purposes of the private law; as well to provide a more detailed analysis of the areas of tort law, contract law, commercial law and property law.
restricted: MAppLaw, LLM, LLM(Adv), LLM(16), LLM(24), MICLaw(16), MICLaw(24) and MICLaw/MCom
